channel.title: Neural Network on Ryan's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Neural Network on Ryan's Blog

item.title: Let's talk about SGD: Stochastic Gradient Descent
item.description: It is well known that the Neural Network model is functioning by cooperation of two major components: A “loss function” An “optimizer” The loss function measures the disparity between the the target’s true value and the value the model predicts. There are many kinds of loss function in building the NN model, such as MAE (mean absolute error), MSE(mean-squared error) and Huber loss. I will summarize different usages of them in another post.
